title: little devil teemo icon
body: i beat Doom Bots on level 100 and i didn't get the icon. pls help me get it{{champion:17}}  and i did not disconnect or leave during the end.

replies.body:
It can take *up to a week* for the icon to be added on your account after beating a *Doom Bots* mode. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Hello Tardon,

I won a match in Doom of bots of doom and defeated teemo. That was 10 days ago, i still haven't received the icon, what should i do?

It actually looks like we're sending these out in waves and the final date to receive the icons is on November 17th. 

If you don't have it by the end of the 17th, hit us up in [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=L9X2oMJg,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2016-11-01T22:21:38.270+0000)
>
> It actually looks like we're sending these out in waves and the final date to receive the icons is on November 17th. 
> 
> If you don't have it by the end of the 17th, hit us up in [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

commenting here in case I never get it 8^) thanks
same
Hey I maked 2 wins but after a week I still dont got the Icon :/
Hello, I also won a match in Doom Bots of Doom on October 20th and still haven't received an icon
thank u targon

i had my little devil teemo icon but after cleaning my pc(antivirus) now it doesn't show up, i have a black square instead of the icon. i can press it and then i have a black icon as my icon, but in the loading screen i have the icon. What i have to do?
Don't worry its already fixed

Hi, I just logged in today & I have recieved the icon . I went on google to search for how/why ? I still don't understand. I've only played 2 doom bot games when it came out but not much happened? we beat them... but my friend who played both games with me didnt get it. So now I'm confused.
I beat it the first weekend and still haven't received it ;-;
Same beat it first friday night FeelsBadMan.
Do you get it if you win the teemoing mode or only the gauntlet?

Yeah I beat both modes the day it came out and still no Little Devil icon but I did not beat level 100.  The Little Devil and Pumpkin ones seem like they will take 7-14 days to come out like the Draven golden icon from April did.  If by Friday night it isn't in might wanna contact support.

I believe it will arrive 1-2 weeks after doom bots has ended if you do get the icon (Wait, do you have to beat lv 100 to get the icon? would you please do a game with me? QAQ i can barely get to teemo on 100)

No, it just has to be a difficulty change in gauntlet
You can read it on the league website...
Where did you read that it must be on gauntlet difficulty,i heard from a rioter that both teemoing and the gauntlet are fine to get the icon :/
It can be any game inside the *Doom Bots* mode. ^.^
hehe ty for clarifing the question Targons Blade ^.^

go to the front page of the league website and look thru the news pages
the revel of teemoing
